title: Replace background music with more exciting/thrilling track

requirements.summary: Replace the current background music file with a new, more exciting and thrilling music track that plays continuously throughout the quiz game experience
acceptanceCriteria: New background music file is more energetic and thrilling in tempo and intensity compared to the current track
Music loops continuously during gameplay without interruption
Music maintains consistent volume and quality throughout playback

file_operations.description: Replace the existing background music file with a new, more exciting and thrilling music track. The new track must have higher tempo and intensity to create an energetic and suspenseful atmosphere during the quiz gameplay. Ensure the audio file maintains high quality, loops seamlessly without gaps or clicks at the loop point, and has consistent volume throughout the duration.
